alert.note: Alert for Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 01 at 2:33PM PST until February 03 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO NOON PST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Northeast winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts to 40 mph expected. Strongest west valley north of the 210 freeway on Wednesday morning and Wednesday evening. * WHERE...San Gabriel Valley. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to noon PST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Major roadways that could be impacted by the gusty winds include the 210 freeway.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley
